ExtendedSection.Title: Content fields of the element view content

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: The title is mapped to the Title property and used as name of the view in the page editor, if no title key is given.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: A key from a workplace message bundle to show a localized name of the element view in the page editor. Provide only the rare key, e.g., myelementview.title.

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: Non-negative integer value to specify the display order relative to other element views. Element views with smaller numbers are displayed earlier.
